title: Initialize function in BaseBranchRouter.sol, BranchPort.sol, CoreRootRouter.sol, MulticallRootRouter.sol, RootPort.sol, ArbitrumBranchBridgeAgentFactory.sol, BranchBridgeAgentFactory.sol, ERC20hTokenBranchFactory.sol, ERC20hTokenRootFactory.sol can be invoked multiple times from the implementation contract
